EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Value-Added Tax Regulations 2010 (S.I. No. 
639 of 2010) by inserting a new Regulation 14A, for the purposes of Postponed 
Accounting. 

The Regulations specify the requirements to be complied with and impose 
conditions or restrictions that must be satisfied or observed in respect of all 
steps leading to accounting for VAT on a postponed basis, to ensure that the 
accountable person has the necessary capacity and capability to account for 
VAT on that basis.
